0.name: Galespin Summersault
0.fullDesc: Deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Bladeborne Quake
0.fullDesc: Restores HP equal to <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK plus <orangeStrong>{{4}}</orangeStrong>. Deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to a single target enemy and Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to adjacent targets.
0.shortDesc: Restores this unit's HP and deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy and adjacent targets.

0.name: Earthbind, Etherbreak
0.fullDesc:
Consumes {{8}} Energy. Yunli gains Parry and Taunts all enemies, lasting until the end of the next ally's or enemy's turn. Increases the CRIT DMG dealt by Yunli's next Counter by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When triggering the Counter effect from Talent, launches the <u>Counter</u> "Intuit: Cull" instead and removes the Parry effect. If no Counter is triggered while Parry is active, Yunli will immediately launch the <u>Counter</u> "Intuit: Slash" on a random enemy target.

"Intuit: Slash": Deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to the target, and deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{6, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to adjacent targets.
"Intuit: Cull": Deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to the target, and deals Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{6, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, additionally deals {{4}} instances of DMG, each dealing Physical DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{7, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Yunli's ATK to a random single enemy.

When Yunli deals DMG via this ability, it's considered as dealing Ultimate DMG.
0.shortDesc: Enters "Parry" and taunts all enemies. When attacked during this period, triggers <orangeStrong>powerful <u>Counter</u></orangeStrong> and <orangeStrong>deals Physical DMG</orangeStrong> to the attacker and adjacent targets. Then, deals minor Physical DMG to a single enemy that bounces 6 times. If no Counter is triggered during the Parry state, deals Physical DMG to a random enemy target and adjacent targets when Parry ends.

0.name: Posterior Precedence
0.fullDesc: This unit gains the Ward effect, lasting for {{2}} seconds. During this time, upon entering combat by either attacking enemies or receiving an attack, immediately casts "Intuit: Cull" on a random enemy, and increases the DMG dealt by this attack by {{1, percent}}%.
0.shortDesc: This unit gains the Ward effect, lasting for 20 seconds. During this time, upon entering combat by either attacking enemies or receiving an attack, immediately casts "Intuit: Cull" on a random enemy.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Fiery Wheel
0.fullDesc: After each use of "Intuit: Slash," the next "Intuit: Slash" will be replaced by "Intuit: Cull."

0.name: Demon Quell
0.fullDesc: While in the Parry state, resists Crowd Control debuffs received and reduces DMG received by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: True Sunder
0.fullDesc: When using a Counter, increases Yunli's ATK by {{1, percent}}%, lasting for 1 turn.

1.name: Weathered Blade Does Not Sully
1.desc: Increases DMG dealt by "Intuit: Slash" and "Intuit: Cull" by {{1, percent}}%. Increases the number of additional DMG instances for "Intuit: Cull" by {{2}}.

2.name: First Luster Breaks Dawn
2.desc: When dealing DMG via Counter, ignores {{1, percent}}% of the target's DEF.

3.name: Mastlength Twirls Mountweight
3.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Artisan's Ironsong
4.desc: After launching "Intuit: Slash" or "Intuit: Cull," increases this unit's Effect RES by {{1, percent}}%, lasting for {{2}} turn(s).

5.name: Blade of Old Outlasts All
5.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Walk in Blade, Talk in Zither
6.desc: While Parry is active, if an enemy actively uses their abilities, regardless of whether it attacks Yunli or not, it will trigger "Intuit: Cull" and remove the "Parry" effect. When dealing DMG via "Intuit: Slash" or "Intuit: Cull," increases CRIT Rate by {{1, percent}}% and Physical RES PEN by {{2, percent}}%.
